sourcesContent:
Ajouter un skieur :

import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup } from '@angular/forms'; import { SkieurService } from 'src/app/services/skieur.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-add-inscription', templateUrl: './add-inscription.component.html', styleUrls: ['./add-inscription.component.scss'] }) export class AddInscriptionComponent { cours:any[] skieurs:any[] InscForm : FormGroup constructor(private fb: FormBuilder,private skieurService:SkieurService) {} ngOnInit() { this.InscForm = this.fb.group({ numSemaine: [''], cours:[''], skieurs:[''] }); this.skieurService.getAllSkieurs().subscribe(res=>{ this.skieurs=res },err=>{ console.log(err) }) } addInscription() { console.log(this.InscForm.value) } }
